bibl.title: Other Early Christian Gospels. A Critical Edition of the Surviving Greek Manuscripts.
bibl.note: Contains new English translations and critical Greek texts of: Gospel of Thomas; - Gospel of Peter; - Unknown Gospel (P. Egerton 2 [= van Haelst 586] + P. Köln VI, 255); - Small fragments of various unidentified Gospels. - Non vidimus.
bibl.seg: BERNHARD Andrew Eric, Other Early Christian Gospels. A Critical Edition of the Surviving Greek Manuscripts. (Library of New Testament Studies. 315.)
London - New York, T&T Clark International, 2006, 8°, xiv-191 pp. ISBN 0-567-04204-9 (hbk) / 0-567-04568-4 (pbk). $130 (hbk) / $55 (pbk).

Contains new English translations and critical Greek texts of: Gospel of Thomas; - Gospel of Peter; - Unknown Gospel (P. Egerton 2 [= van Haelst 586] + P. Köln VI, 255); - Small fragments of various unidentified Gospels. - Non vidimus.

C.R. par J.K. Elliott, JThS 58 (2007) pp. 687-689. - Thomas J. Kraus, TC: A Journal of Biblical Textual Criticism 12 (2007) < http://rosetta.reltech.org/TC/vol12/Bernhard2007rev.pdf >. - J.K. Elliott, NT 50 (2008) p. 307.
